pr_title: CAMEL-14805: Component - Use doInit for wiring instead of doStart

timeline.bodyText: Oh there may be a problem when creating an URI as its a network resource. And its either URL or URI in Java that does some networking thingy when being created. @gnodet @ppalaga @lburgazzoli @oscerd @jamesnetherton ?
timeline.author: davsclaus

replies.bodyText: No, there is no network access when creating a URI afaik.
replies.author: gnodet

replies.bodyText: Ah thanks yeah I found the answer too in the javadocs, URI mentions further below that URL on contrast does IO networking: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/net/URI.html
replies.author: davsclaus
